item.title: What 125 years of data says about diversification and investing at record highs
item.description: Global investment returns yearbook finds stock-market investing is profitable but volatile.

item.title: The world’s biggest dividend has just been cut. Here’s why.
item.description: Saudi Arabian Oil Co. has slashed its massive dividend payout — the world’s biggest — as the state oil producer’s profit fell amid struggling oil pric...

item.title: My husband gave his son, 30, who has struggled with drug addiction, his credit card. It did not go well.
item.description: “This young man has been enabled financially by both of his parents, but especially by his mom.”

item.title: Treasury yields near 3-month lows as Trump tariffs increase growth fears
I’m 69 and worked for the same company for 45 years. I only have $121,000 in my 401(k). How can I repair this damage?
item.description: “I plan to work and contribute to a 401(k) in addition to a stock-purchasing plan for a few more years.”
